data.title: Film A Magic Ray. (1963)
data.meta_description: About the history of the Soviet cinematography from its emergence till the 60-s of the XX century.
data.text:
CSDF film set.

Camera lens - CU.

On location shoots cameraman Malik Kayumov.

Vasily Kiselev operator on an elephant during a trip to India.

The elephant on the trunk carries equipment.

With the machine operator removes Wolf Citron.

With the glider operator removes Abram Krichevsky.

Removes operator Leonid Kotlyarenko.

Aircraft in the air.

Removes operator Alexander Istomin.

The launch of the missile in the air.

The aircraft take off camera.

Cinema "Drummer".

The audience in the hall.

Cinema "Russia."

The first film in the history of documentary photography Lumiere Brothers (1896) -

Arrival of the train.

Newsreel of the early twentieth century:

The first scene the film, a two-minute comedy "political waterer" (fragment).

Pianist plays.

Film studios "Mosfilm", is shooting.

The place where it was built studio "Mosfilm" - a vacant lot near the village Potylikha.

Meeting before the start of construction.

Newsreel 1927:

Men drive a peg.

Newspaper in 1919 with the Decree of the CPC about movies and articles, is aimed at the workers' struggle with the fuel crisis, famine and epidemics.

Newsreel 1920.:

People work at a volunteer, go to the front soldiers, said VI Lenin.

Kinohronikery first.

Fragment from the film of the hydraulic extraction of peat.

Train is the first years of the revolution.

Said M. Kalinin.

Movie projector outdoors.

Hang the screen.

Animation: posters of old movies - Kinodrom salon.

Shooting the film, takes reasonable.

Newsreel 1925:

Directed by Sergei Eisenstein and cameraman Edward Tise on first viewing the film.

Photo: director Vsevolod Pudovkin.

Fragments of feature films: "Arsenal" Alexander Dovzhenko, "Chip Empire" director Ermler, "Road to Life" Nicholas Eck (starring Nikolai Batalov), "Counter" and Ermler Jutkevich (in the role of master actor Gardin).

Newsreel 1930s.

The authors of the first Soviet sound film systems - engineers Shorin and Tager.

Newsreel 1930.:

Grimiruetsya the role Chapaev artist Boris A. Babochkin.

Sergei and Georgy Vasilyev - director of the film "Chapaev" in the editing room.

Fragment from the film "Chapev": Chapaev Commissioner explains that is to be the commander in combat.

Newsreel 1930.:

Organized, columns, people go to watch the movie "Chapaev".

In Spain are soldiers battalion Chapayev Republican Army.

Directed by the tale of a young Bolshevik Maxim I. Kozintsev Trauberg, operator Moskvin in the editing room.

Excerpts from the film "Youth of Maxim" (starring Boris Chirkov): Three friends singing a song "turns, turns blue ball."

Excerpts from the film "The Vyborg Side (Max says goodbye to Natasha)," We are from Kronstadt "(the mother accompanies seafarers).

The film's director and writer Dzigan Vsevolod Vishnevsky (photo).

Newsreel 1930.:

Bolshoi Theatre building with the words "15 years of Soviet cinema."

Soviet filmmakers: Vasilyev brothers, Ezenshteyn.

Pudovkin, Ermler, etc.

On the development of film tells AM Bitter (synchronously).

Bitter of the floor.

Filming of "Virgin Soil Upturned" (the first film adaptation of the novel Sholokhov).

Directed by Julius Reisman talks to actor Dorofeev (Shchukar).

Caption: "Quiet, is shooting» - CU.

PNRM. the orchestra.

Fragment from the film "The Circus" (L. Orlov, Stolyarov).

I.Dunaevsky Lebedev and the poet of the piano-Kumach (synchronously).

Excerpts from the film "Rich Bride," "The Great Life", "Komsomolskaya".

Photo: director Ivan Pyriev.

Excerpts from the film "The party ticket", "member of the government," directed by and Zarchi Heifits (starring - Vera Maretskaya), "Lenin in October" directed by Mikhail Romm (as Lenin - Boris Shchukin, as Basil - Nicholas Okhlopkov), "Man with a Gun" Sergei Jutkevich (Lenin - Maxim Strauch, soldiers Shadrin - Artist Tenin).

Newsreel 1920.:

Excerpts from the film Vertov "Three Songs of Lenin."

Double Exposure: bust of VI Lenin and hydropower.

Soldiers of the systems goes to watch a movie.

Dziga Vertov and Elizabeth Svilova in the editing room.

Photos of the first kinohronikerov USSR operators Novitsky Yermolov Guibert, Levitsky, Slavinsky, Tisse, Lemberg.

Kinohronika1920-1930.:

Operators removed from the vehicle with a crane in the wilderness (Turksib) at the North Pole: the floating station at stratospheric, in Abyssinia, Spain, etc.

The first director, documentary filmmaker Ilya Kopalin Nicholas Karmazinsky, Samuel Bubrik Sergey Gurov, Arsh Ovanesova in mounting.

Newsreel 1941-1945.:

Operators at the front.

Removes operator Stoyanovskii.

Military friends say goodbye to him at his grave.

Removes operator Vladimir Sušica.

Footage of his last shot.

A plaque with the names of those killed in the war cameramen, set in the Moscow House of Cinema - PNRM.

Fragment from the film "Two Soldiers" (artists Andreev and Oleynik).

Fragments of feature films: "Rainbow," "The Young Guard".

Newsreel:

Flying the flag over the Reichstag in Berlin, the liberation of the peoples of the Nazi occupation, start hydropower, construction of new buildings, building a new life in the countries liberated from colonization, demonstrations of workers in capitalist countries.

Excerpts from the documentary "Caspian Oil ',' People of blue fire."

The lesson of literature in 739 schools in Moscow.

Students write an essay about a favorite movie character.

Short excerpts from the feature film, "Paul Pavel", "Feat of intelligence," "Scarlet", "Zoe", "Rural teacher."

Pupils watch the movie - MS., CU.

Spectators watch movies - MS.

Excerpts from the film "Ballad of a Soldier" Gregory Chukhrai and Valentin Yezhov (date Alyosha with his mother, Alyosha - Vladimir Ivashov), "The destiny of man" (the scene in the cabin of the machine), "Clean Sky", and G. Chukhrai Khrabrovitsky (artists E. and N. Urbanski Drobysheva).
